q_en: What are the sewing tasks after June 1, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.number AS order_product_quantity, p.attributes AS product_attributes, pt.description AS product_type_description FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE st.start_time > '2024-06-01';
steps.description: Retrieve sewing tasks that started after June 1, 2024, including working group names and order product details

response:
Sure thing! Here are the sewing tasks that started after June 1, 2024. Let's take a look at the details:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group     | Order Quantity | Product Attributes | Product Type Description |
|---------|------------------|------------------|-------------------|----------------|--------------------|--------------------------|
| 33      | July 17, 2024    | August 3, 2024   | Advanced Sewers   | 120            | Grey, 29 size      | Pants                    |
| 32      | June 17, 2024    | July 14, 2024    | Premier Sewers    | 150            | Black, XL size     | Jacket                   |
| 34      | July 10, 2024    | July 20, 2024    | Elite Sewers      | 330            | Purple, M size     | Skirt                    |
